name: Sniper Killer: Strike Shooting
description:
Main concept of this Shooting game is, terrorists have attacked on your city and you have to save the innocent people from these attackers. As an elite sniper shooter in shooting game, you should be responsively quick just aim at the target and show your shooting skills do not waste bullets.

Features:
• 3D game with amazing graphics
• Free FPS sniper shooting game play
• Best 3D FPS game
• Smooth controller to move around enemies
